attributes.action: Listen to MS patients voices and needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am doing this petition to get General health checks for MS patients living in their own homes (ie blood checks, urine checks, blood pressure ect) if the MS patient is not able to go to a doctors surgery they are just left or taken into hospital for these general health checks which is such a waste of money and time. please help us put these points across and get MS patients voices heard!

rejection.details: Please rephrase the title to better reflect the content of your petition, then resubmit. Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
